overview: Set in stone: watch a skatepark cut from a sheer rock face and then shredded to destruction! Once again we have managed to pull off a project which boggles the imagination as we continue our domineering series of projects taking skateboarding where you could never imagine it! In Norway, a quarry cutting perfect stone shapes becomes a temporary playground in a viral clip which will travel far and wide among core skaters and cool-hunters alike!
title: Larvikite Lines
